modification.id: Remove Out of Stock Products from Best Sellers
modification.author: Reason8

operation.search: $query = $this->db->query("SELECT op.product_id, COUNT(*) AS total FROM " . DB_PREFIX . "order_product op LEFT JOIN `" . DB_PREFIX . "order` o ON (op.order_id = o.order_id) LEFT JOIN `" . DB_PREFIX . "product` p ON (op.product_id = p.product_id) LEFT JOIN " . DB_PREFIX . "product_to_store p2s ON (p.product_id = p2s.product_id) WHERE o.order_status_id > '0' AND p.status = '1' AND p.date_available <= NOW() AND p2s.store_id = '" . (int)$this->config->get('config_store_id') . "' GROUP BY op.product_id ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT " . (int)$limit);
operation.add: $query = $this->db->query("SELECT op.product_id, COUNT(*) AS total FROM " . DB_PREFIX . "order_product op LEFT JOIN `" . DB_PREFIX . "order` o ON (op.order_id = o.order_id) LEFT JOIN `" . DB_PREFIX . "product` p ON (op.product_id = p.product_id) LEFT JOIN " . DB_PREFIX . "product_to_store p2s ON (p.product_id = p2s.product_id) WHERE o.order_status_id > '0' AND p.status = '1' AND p.quantity > '0' AND p.date_available <= NOW() AND p2s.store_id = '" . (int)$this->config->get('config_store_id') . "' GROUP BY op.product_id ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT " . (int)$limit);
